awd_titl_txt: Teacher Development and Research in STS Education for Rural Middle/Junior High School Science Teachers from Central     Pennsylvania and Northern West Virginia
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal is directed at the development of a cadre of                      Science, Technology, and Society (STS) teachers at the                          middle/junior high school level in rural areas of central                       Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia.  The goal of the                       proposal is to establish a cadre of STS teacher leaders who                     will have the ability to develop and implement STS units.  The                  proposal will also investigate the effectiveness of the                         teachers in disseminating STS materials in their own schools                    as well as to the larger community of science educators.                                                                                                        Cost sharing is equivalent to 8% of the NSF award.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
